an8.6:1.1: “Atthime, bhikkhave, lokadhamma lokam anuparivattanti, loko ca attha lokadhamme anuparivattati.
an8.6:1.3: Labho ca, alabho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, ninda ca, pasamsa ca, sukhanca, dukkhanca.
an8.6:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, attha lokadhamma lokam anuparivattanti, loko ca ime attha lokadhamme anuparivattati.
an8.6:2.1: Assutavato, bhikkhave, puthujjanassa uppajjati labhopi alabhopi yasopi ayasopi nindapi pasamsapi sukhampi dukkhampi.
an8.6:2.2: Sutavatopi, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa uppajjati labhopi alabhopi yasopi ayasopi nindapi pasamsapi sukhampi dukkhampi.
an8.6:2.3: Tatra, bhikkhave, ko viseso ko adhippayaso kim nanakaranam sutavato ariyasavakassa assutavata puthujjanena”ti?
an8.6:2.4: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma bhagavamnettika bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantamyeva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
an8.6:3.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an8.6:3.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an8.6:3.7: so ca kho anicco dukkho viparinamadhammo’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an8.6:3.17: tanca kho aniccam dukkham viparinamadhamman’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an8.6:4.1: Tassa labhopi cittam pariyadaya titthati, alabhopi cittam pariyadaya titthati, yasopi cittam pariyadaya titthati, ayasopi cittam pariyadaya titthati, nindapi cittam pariyadaya titthati, pasamsapi cittam pariyadaya titthati, sukhampi cittam pariyadaya titthati, dukkhampi cittam pariyadaya titthati.
an8.6:4.2: So uppannam labham anurujjhati, alabhe pativirujjhati;
an8.6:4.6: So evam anurodhavirodhasamapanno na parimuccati jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi.
an8.6:5.1: Sutavato ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa uppajjati labho.
an8.6:5.4: so ca kho anicco dukkho viparinamadhammo’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an8.6:5.14: tanca kho aniccam dukkham viparinamadhamman’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an8.6:6.1: Tassa labhopi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, alabhopi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, yasopi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, ayasopi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, nindapi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, pasamsapi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, sukhampi cittam na pariyadaya titthati, dukkhampi cittam na pariyadaya titthati.
an8.6:6.2: So uppannam labham nanurujjhati, alabhe nappativirujjhati;
an8.6:6.6: So evam anurodhavirodhavippahino parimuccati jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi.
an8.6:6.8: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, viseso ayam adhippayaso idam nanakaranam sutavato ariyasavakassa assutavata puthujjanenati.
